A salutation from the breathings of the life to the faithful in the kingdome and patience of Jesus Christ through Joseph Helling. Helling, Joseph.
8 p.
Printed for Robert Wilson, London : [1661]
Dated: "From the common gaole in Northampton, the 10 day of the 2 month, 1661." Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
